Text: I'm on a mission to leave a fucked up comment on EVERY Phish torrent (I have a LOT of work cut out for me). Do you begging, bumming fucking maggots ever appreciate uploads of your heroes Phish?! I'm not some right-wing fucking conservative asshole, I'm actually kind of a hippie myself, BUT. I would never beg or bum off of someone TO GO TO A FUCKING CONCERT!!!!!  I remember the days I went to Dead shows, and I couldn't stand the begging, bumming fuckers there either!!! Money just doesn't grow on trees (unless maybe you have an indoor grow-op). Thing is, people that grow pot AT LEAST DO SOMETHING, and don't expect others to pay their way through life! Fucking maggots!!!
